wikipedia_page.main: Rose Thomas (born 24 February 1987) is a full-time blogger based in London who is best known for self promotion, creating her own wiki pages, and her lifestyle blog The Londoner.Thomas married Philip Jan Van Sandwijk in Italy in June 2018. On 19 February 2019 Thomas announced she had delivered her first child, a daughter named Lily Valentine, on 14 February 2019.

response: * Rose Thomas (rugby union) (born 1988), French rugby sevens player
* Rose Thomas (field hockey) (born 1992), Welsh field hockey player
